sentences.sContent: It would be a rare case involving a foreigner if Frank is convicted of bigamy.
sentences.sContent_eng: It would be a rare case involving a foreigner if Frank is convicted of bigamy.
sentences.sCn: 如果弗兰克被判重婚罪，此案将因外国人介入成为罕见案例。

sentences.sContent: Another marriage that nobody counted — a case of bigamy at sea with a has-been Mexican actor — lasted only a day and was annulled.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another marriage that nobody counted — a case of bigamy at sea with a has-been Mexican actor — lasted only a day and was annulled.
sentences.sCn: 此外还有一桩没有人当真的婚姻――她曾在海上与一个前墨西哥演员犯下重婚罪――这场婚姻只持续了一天就被宣告无效。

remMethod.val: bi (两) + gam (婚姻) + y → 重婚； 重婚罪

trans.tranOther: the crime of being married to two people at the same time
